Class TupleConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • mypackage.TupleConverter

  • public class TupleConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class's purpose is to convert a list of tuples to a byte array of a set size pageSize and vice versa
    Author:
    Georgios Frangias
